import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Button, Col,Row, ListGroup, Image, Card} from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import Message from '../components/Message' import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps' const PlaceOrderScreen = () => { const cart = useSelector( state=> state.cart) return ( <>

Address: {cart.shippingAddress.address}, {cart.shippingAddress.city},{cart.shippingAddress.postalCode},{cart.shippingAddress.country},

Method: {cart.paymentMethod} ) } export default PlaceOrderScreen
